topic.title: I have an idea and a question for ZeroBlog
topic.body:
First, would it be a good idea or not to add a wallpaper to the ZeroBlog? This way we are not bothered by the white or dark frame without flavor :D 
Secondly, does anyone know how to center an element in ZeroBlog?

1551172650_1KkQmWnbZatijrNzgs4qtyyYcAXyE.body:
It's okay, I did it,
the screenshot is on my ZeroMe
Thanks @SSDifnskdjfnsdjk
I still have to mark it in the real index.html

I have added a padding: 20px, border-radius: 15px and background-color: white with an opacity of 0.9 to .left
                           position: relative, border-radius:15px and background-color: white with an opacity of 0.9 to .right
